Title: Chanto Kao ni Kaite Aru
Description: ['Music video for the song ', Chanto Kao ni Kaite Aru, " by Japanese singer Iruka (Toshie Hosaka) that was featured on NHK's Minna no Uta program. The video was animated by Yasuhiko Suzuki."]
